title: THEODORA DOUBLE TRILLION, LAB WHITE SAPPHIRE AND NANO CRYSTAL EMERALD RIVIÈRE NECKLACE
description: This style is part of a limited run ready to ship color capsule and will not return once sold out.Crafted from individual 0.25 carat trillion shaped lab-grown white sapphires and nano crystal emerald set in sterling silver, the Theodora rivière makes a striking entrance this season in a new limited run colorway.
details:
Metal: Sterling silver
Setting: 3-prong
Stone Type: Nano crystal emerald and white sapphire
Stone Shape: Trillion cut



15 inches, 28.75 CTW DEW
16 inches, 30.75 CTW DEW

What is Lab-Grown?
